categoryRubrics.rule: Generally, the identifiers found within a CDA document should be unique and non-reoccurring within the same document.

referenceErrors.description: Consol US Realm Header SHALL contain at least one [1..*] recordTarget, where its type is Record Target (CONF:5266) each SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] patientRole, where  (CONF:5268) patientRole SHALL contain at least one [1..*] telecom (CONF:5280, R2.1=CONF:1198-5280)

A compatible R1.1 templateId without an extension must be included in addition to the existing R2.1 templateId with an extension for Functional Status Section2 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.14:2014-06-09. When asserting this templateId, all C-CDA R2.1 document, section, and entry templates that had a previous version in C-CDA R1.1 SHALL include both the C-CDA R2.1 templateId and the C-CDA R1.1 templateId root without an extension. See C-CDA R2.1 Volume 1 - Design Considerations for additional detail (CONF:1198-32936, CONF:1198-32934, DSTU:757, DSTU:781).
